message.content:
The line item that represents the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period is **"Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable"**.

From the provided cash flow statement:

| Account                          | Amount      | Date       |
|---------------------------------|-------------|------------|
| Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable | 1260000.00 | 2024-01-28 |

This indicates an increase of 1,260,000.00 in accounts payable, meaning the entity owes 1,260,000.00 more during this period for goods or services purchased on credit.
